```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE,
                      warning=FALSE,
                      message=FALSE)

# Load Functions.
source("../../functions/myFunctions.R") 

# Load packages.
installMissingPackages(
  c(
    # Include statistical packages.
    "performance",

    "tidyverse",

```


```{r load corpus,include=FALSE}
l_star_h_types = c("^[L*]H", "L*H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")

# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("../data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  # Select only columns for analysis
  select(
    speaker,
    gender,
    mode,
    prompt,
    acc_phon,
    fin_phon,
    lh_mean_f0) %>% 
  filter(acc_phon %in% l_star_h_types)  %>% 
  mutate(acc_phon = factor(acc_phon,
                           levels = l_star_h_types)
         )
```

```{r run initial model,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9, eval=FALSE, tidy = TRUE}

# run model
lh_mean_f0_model <- lmer(
  lh_mean_f0 ~ mode + acc_phon +
    (1 + acc_phon + mode | speaker) +
    (1 | gender) +
    (1 | fin_phon) +
    (1 | prompt),
        data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
            optimizer = "optimx",
            calc.derivs = FALSE,
            optCtrl = list(
                method = "nlminb",
                starttests = FALSE,
                kkt = FALSE
            )
        )
      )


summariseLME(lh_mean_f0_model, run_step=TRUE) %>% print()

```

#### `lh_mean_f0 ~ mode + acc_phon + (1 + mode | speaker) + (1 | fin_phon) + (1 | prompt)`

```{r run intercepts only model, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, tidy = TRUE}

lh_mean_f0_model_reduced <- lmer(
  lh_mean_f0 ~ mode + acc_phon +
    (1 + mode | speaker) + (1 | fin_phon) + (1 | prompt),
  data = m_corpus,
  control = lmerControl(
    optimizer = "bobyqa",
    calc.derivs = FALSE,
    optCtrl = list(
      method = "nlminb",
      starttests = FALSE,
      kkt = FALSE
    )
  )
)

m_corpus.trimmed <- m_corpus %>% filter(abs(scale(resid(lh_mean_f0_model_reduced))) <= 4)

lh_mean_f0_model_reduced <- lmer(
  lh_mean_f0 ~ mode + acc_phon +
    (1 + mode | speaker) + (1 | fin_phon) + (1 | prompt),
  data = m_corpus.trimmed,
  control = lmerControl(
    optimizer = "bobyqa",
    calc.derivs = FALSE,
    optCtrl = list(
      method = "nlminb",
      starttests = FALSE,
      kkt = FALSE
    )
  )
)
summariseLME(lh_mean_f0_model_reduced,
             run_step = TRUE,
             write="../output_model_anovas/Mode_PA_lh_mean_f0_anova.csv")

```



```{r make tidy model, fig.height=2.5, fig.width=5, results="asis"}

lh_mean_f0_model.tidy <- analyseModel(lh_mean_f0_model_reduced,
                                write="../output/Mode_PA_lh_mean_f0"
                                )
lh_mean_f0_model.tidy$table

```
